posts.name: Chick and Ruth's
posts.note: Lively landmark diner featuring greasy-spoon breakfasts and piled-high sandwiches in kitschy environs. You need to try their breakfast items or one of their other meals named after famous people.

posts.name: Davis's Pub
posts.note: Long-running (since the 1920s) neighborhood joint known for its crab cakes and creative pub fare.

posts.name: Double T Diner
posts.note: Local diner chain with a retro vibe and a menu of comfort-food classics (some are open 24 hours). You need to try some of their great desserts along with the large breakfasts.

posts.name: Storm Brothers Ice Cream Factory
posts.note: Neighborhood ice cream parlor serving cones, shakes, flurries, sundaes and more since 1976. I once drove 50 miles each way to have ice cream here that tells you how good the ice cream is.
